entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
